404.title: Oh no! You shouldn't be seeing this
404.detail: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist.

500.title: Oops, that's our mistake.
500.detail: We're not quite sure what happened, but our servers say something is wrong. We apologize and are working to fix the issue. Please try again later.

400.title: Something went wrong
400.detail: There seems to be an error processing your request.
